title: Earthquake hits Swat and surrounding areas
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 27 (APP): An earthquake measuring 5.3 on the Richter Scale struck Swat and neighboring regions in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa on Tuesday.
According to a private news channel, the quakeâ€™s epicenter was located near the border of Tajikistan and Afghanistan, at a depth of 110 kilometers.
In response to the tremor, residents evacuated their homes and recited Kalma-e-Tayyaba in fear.
Fortunately, no casualties or property damage have been reported from Khyber Pakhtunkhwa
